• Become a domain expert and conduct data analysis to drive financial benefits without compromising customer experience.

• , hypothesis testing, regression) and experience designing and evaluating experiments.

• Sourcing & Engagement: Identify high-potential talent through campus partnerships, sourcing platforms, online technical communities, and direct outreach.
